1125476338733682689.text:
Excited to launch "Leverage / Save" CDP feature on our Banking Portal.

[Loop] Draw DAI >> Buy ETH >> Lock ETH.

[Save] Free ETH >> Buy DAI >> Wipe Debt.

All in one txn, interacts with @MakerDAO, @KyberNetwork, @UniswapExchange and makes your life easier.pic.twitter.com/sBo8caJGG2

1120395191242903554.text:
We are thrilled to release the support for @UniswapExchange Pools on InstaDApp. Manage your UniPools along with your CDP & Balances on a single dashboard.

https://instadapp.io pic.twitter.com/8dcAkO0san

1118222112412430336.text:
Launching InstaDApp v2 - #DEFI interactions via Contract Wallet, demonstrating integration of @MakerDAO @UniswapExchange @KyberNetwork on a single dashboard.

Check out: http://instadapp.io pic.twitter.com/ytt5agtbJc

1115363081163423744.text: Someone wiped $5500 DAI debt from our team's CDP which we use to bootstrap the project http://makerscan.io  - really liked the concept of Public Funding via CDPs. We look forward to formalizing the process of using CDPs for issuing debt instruments (ERC20) to fund projects.pic.twitter.com/Emo3X4ijq9

1105536216848523264.text:
Commencing @InstaDApp [v2]. Beta launch in a few weeks.
 User Owned Contract Wallet.
 Internal Protocol Integration.
 Fund Recovery via Guardians.
 User Sessions Mechanism.
 Instant Data Rendering.
 Robust Tracking System.https://medium.com/instadapp/v2-624b4e896bce …

1103783519472574465.text:
11c/ As a weird way to "fund" open-source crypto, I wiped $30 from @MakerScan's ETH/DAI debt. h/t @NTmoney for finding this.

https://makerscan.io/cups/2248/

1096427290504790016.text: [5] Guess what, you just created a CDP! You will have a unique CDP ID, whose detailed stats you can view on @MakerScan, just enter your ID in the search box. You can also set alerts through Email or Telegram to track your CDP, in case you're playing risky or not.pic.twitter.com/wudqbYec6Z

1096003730728726528.text:
Tried it myself - works like a charm!
Super handy tool to track your @MakerDAO CDP or get push info previously available only on https://makerscan.io/ .
The only thing to improve from my point of view is an option to only get message once CDP enters in danger zone of liquidationhttps://twitter.com/smykjain/status/1080515442073059328 …

1093996421001314304.text: On Feb 6th, we observed on @MakerScan logs that some address 0xcc...59 irrationally wiped between 20 to 500 #DAI from many CDPs. Here's one of the eyewitness.https://www.reddit.com/r/MakerDAO/comments/aod80a/i_think_someone_wiped_dai_from_my_cdp_to_keep_it/ …

1093282983836938240.text:
9:11am

The creators of @MakerScan and @EaswapHQ - @InstaDApp - introduce v2.0 of its easy-to-use, MakerDAO-powered decentralized bank.

In the team's ann., they propose the concept of a 'Giant CDP' (shown below).

Ann. link: https://medium.com/instadapp/v2-banking-protocol-52ab8327239 …pic.twitter.com/6edAYgGJHr

1092833163917778944.text: Sharing our plans with @InstaDApp as the core banking model and publishing initial details on "Giant CDP" to utilise idle #ETH locked in @MakerDAO.https://medium.com/instadapp/v2-banking-protocol-52ab8327239 …

1091395758593499137.text:
I'm thinking about setting up a bounty on @ethBounties asking for people to monitor my @MakerDAO CDP and wipe some of it using @MakerScan if I'm 5% away from liquidation.

Crowdsourcing risk management seems great but:
- How do I price it?
- Is the loss of privacy worth it?

1084863585367412737.text:
MakerScan is now my favorite DEFI explorer. 

1. Great view of network health at a glance
2. Surfaces the most interesting individual CDPs (Risky, High debt, High collateral, High, Top 100)
3. Solid visual design making arcane stats easy to consume

Other protocols take notehttps://twitter.com/sowmay_jain/status/1084856705182285824 …

1082715783774564360.text:
CDP exchange, interesting functionality in 2 ways.

1) Sell unique CDP number at a premium.

2) Sell CDP at a discount at the time of liquidation (to not get penalized 13%).

We will do some brainstorming this weekend.

And I'll keep an eye on 10K CDP ID

1076255944869216257.text:
Been playing around with @MakerScan - my favorite features:

*Sleek interface
*Quick view of CDPs at risk
*Drill-down on CDPs to see additional metrics (like how much ETH the owner can free)
*Ability to track CDPs via alerts (this is coming soon)

Great work @InstaDApp team!
